data.title: Tommy Savas - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Tommy Savas: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Most well known for his work on the comedy series Extra Butter, Please, he is also notable for his performances on Hollywood Heights, Psycho Girlfriend, and State of Affairs.

Before Fame

He began his career as a child actor, and, in his late teens, appeared in two episodes of the popular HBO series The Sopranos.

Trivia

Beginning in 2014, he played the recurring role of Cossetti on the TNT drama The Last Ship.

Family Life

Born in New York City, he and his three older siblings grew up in Cresskill, New Jersey. He later lived and worked in Los Angeles, California.

Associated With
